result.reason: Feature request for browser chrome (menu/bookmarks/URL bar) in integrated HTTP connections — the embedded browser deliberately runs minimal, and the HTTP protocol is legacy (IE-based ActiveX); modern browsers cannot be embedded this way, making this enhancement impractical.
result.approach: No fix — the embedded IE/Edge WebBrowser control does not support exposing full browser UI (menus, bookmarks) within a hosted panel. This is a platform limitation of the WebBrowser ActiveX control, not a bug. Recommend users open URLs in their native browser instead.

attempts.raw_output:
This is a feature request for browser integration enhancements (menu, bookmarks, URL bar visibility) when using integrated HTTP/HTTPS connections. The browser is embedded via COM/ActiveX and currently runs in a minimal "kiosk-like" mode with no browser chrome. This is a P3 enhancement request with no recent user activity confirming it's still needed.
